verses.text: A \w false|strong="H4820"\w* \w balance|strong="H3976"\w* \add is\add* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: but a \w just|strong="H8003"\w* \w weight|strong="H0068"\w* \add is\add* his \w delight|strong="H7522"\w*.\f + \fr 11.1 \ft A false…: Heb. Balances of deceit\f*\f + \fr 11.1 \ft just…: Heb. perfect stone\f*

\add When\add* \w pride|strong="H2087"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w*, then \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* \w shame|strong="H7036"\w*: but with the \w lowly|strong="H6800"\w* \add is\add* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*.

The \w integrity|strong="H8538"\w* of the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* shall \w guide|strong="H5148"\w* them: but the \w perverseness|strong="H5558"\w* of \w transgressors|strong="H0898"\w* shall \w destroy|strong="H7703"\w* them.

\w Riches|strong="H1952"\w* \w profit|strong="H3276"\w* not in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w*: but \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w delivereth|strong="H5337"\w* from \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.

The \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* of the \w perfect|strong="H8549"\w* shall \w direct|strong="H3474"\w* his \w way|strong="H1870"\w*: but the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by his own \w wickedness|strong="H7564"\w*.\f + \fr 11.5 \ft direct: Heb. rectify\f*

The \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* of the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* shall \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* them: but \w transgressors|strong="H0898"\w* shall be \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* in \add their own\add* \w naughtiness|strong="H1942"\w*.

When a \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w dieth|strong="H4194"\w*, \add his\add* \w expectation|strong="H8615"\w* shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*: and the \w hope|strong="H8431"\w* of \w unjust|strong="H0205"\w* \add men\add* \w perisheth|strong="H0006"\w*.
The \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* is delivered \w out|strong="H2502"\w* of \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*, and the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* in his stead.

An \w hypocrite|strong="H2611"\w* with \add his\add* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w destroyeth|strong="H7843"\w* his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*: but through \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* shall the \w just|strong="H6662"\w* be \w delivered|strong="H2502"\w*.

When it goeth \w well|strong="H2898"\w* with the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*, the \w city|strong="H7151"\w* \w rejoiceth|strong="H5970"\w*: and when the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*, \add there is\add* \w shouting|strong="H7440"\w*.

By the \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* of the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* the \w city|strong="H7176"\w* is \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w*: but it is \w overthrown|strong="H2040"\w* by the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.

He that is \w void|strong="H2638"\w* of \w wisdom|strong="H3820"\w* \w despiseth|strong="H0936"\w* his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*: but a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w* holdeth his \w peace|strong="H2790"\w*.\f + \fr 11.12 \ft void…: Heb. destitute of heart\f*

A \w talebearer|strong="H1980"\w* \w revealeth|strong="H1540"\w* \w secrets|strong="H5475"\w*: but he that is of a \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w concealeth|strong="H3680"\w* the \w matter|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 11.13 \ft A talebearer: Heb. He that walketh, being a talebearer\f*

Where no \w counsel|strong="H8458"\w* \add is\add*, the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*: but in the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of \w counsellors|strong="H3289"\w* \add there is\add* \w safety|strong="H8668"\w*.

He that is \w surety|strong="H6148"\w* for a \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w* shall \w smart|strong="H7321"\w* \add for it:\add* and he that \w hateth|strong="H8130"\w* \w suretiship|strong="H8628"\w* is \w sure|strong="H0982"\w*.\f + \fr 11.15 \ft smart: Heb. be sore broken\f*\f + \fr 11.15 \ft suretiship: Heb. those that strike hands\f*

A \w gracious|strong="H2580"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w retaineth|strong="H8551"\w* \w honour|strong="H3519"\w*: and \w strong|strong="H6184"\w* \add men\add* \w retain|strong="H8551"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*.

The \w merciful|strong="H2617"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* doeth \w good|strong="H1580"\w* to his own \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: but \add he that is\add* \w cruel|strong="H0394"\w* \w troubleth|strong="H5916"\w* his own \w flesh|strong="H7607"\w*.

The \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w worketh|strong="H6213"\w* a \w deceitful|strong="H8267"\w* \w work|strong="H6468"\w*: but to him that \w soweth|strong="H2232"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \add shall be\add* a \w sure|strong="H0571"\w* \w reward|strong="H7938"\w*.

As \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \add tendeth\add* to \w life|strong="H2416"\w*: so he that \w pursueth|strong="H7291"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \add pursueth it\add* to his own \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.

They that are of a \w froward|strong="H6141"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \add are\add* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: but \add such as are\add* \w upright|strong="H8549"\w* in \add their\add* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \add are\add* his \w delight|strong="H7522"\w*.

\add Though\add* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add join\add* in \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, the \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* shall not be \w unpunished|strong="H5352"\w*: but the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* shall be \w delivered|strong="H4422"\w*.

\add As\add* a \w jewel|strong="H5141"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* in a \w swine’s|strong="H2386"\w* \w snout|strong="H0639"\w*, \add so is\add* a \w fair|strong="H3303"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* which is \w without|strong="H5493"\w* \w discretion|strong="H2940"\w*.\f + \fr 11.22 \ft is without: Heb. departeth from\f*

The \w desire|strong="H8378"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \add is\add* only \w good|strong="H2896"\w*: \add but\add* the \w expectation|strong="H8615"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \add is\add* \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w*.

There \w is|strong="H3426"\w* that \w scattereth|strong="H6340"\w*, and yet \w increaseth|strong="H3254"\w*; and \add there is\add* that \w withholdeth|strong="H2820"\w* more than is \w meet|strong="H3476"\w*, but \add it tendeth\add* to \w poverty|strong="H4270"\w*.

The \w liberal|strong="H1293"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall be made \w fat|strong="H1878"\w*: and he that \w watereth|strong="H7301"\w* shall be \w watered|strong="H3384"\w* also himself.\f + \fr 11.25 \ft liberal…: Heb. soul of blessing\f*

He that \w withholdeth|strong="H4513"\w* \w corn|strong="H1250"\w*, the \w people|strong="H3816"\w* shall \w curse|strong="H5344"\w* him: but \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* \add shall be\add* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of him that \w selleth|strong="H7666"\w* \add it\add*.

He that diligently \w seeketh|strong="H7836"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w procureth|strong="H1245"\w* \w favour|strong="H7522"\w*: but he that \w seeketh|strong="H1875"\w* \w mischief|strong="H7451"\w*, it shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto him.

He that \w trusteth|strong="H0982"\w* in his \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*: but the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* shall \w flourish|strong="H6524"\w* as a \w branch|strong="H5929"\w*.

He that \w troubleth|strong="H5916"\w* his own \w house|strong="H1004"\w* shall \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w* the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*: and the \w fool|strong="H0191"\w* \add shall be\add* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* to the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* of \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

The \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \add is\add* a \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* of \w life|strong="H2416"\w*; and he that \w winneth|strong="H3947"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \add is\add* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*.\f + \fr 11.30 \ft winneth: Heb. taketh\f*
Behold, the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* shall be \w recompensed|strong="H7999"\w* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: much more the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* and the \w sinner|strong="H2398"\w*.
